text.0: instruct me all ye gods how i elected your priest must seat me here and how address you.
text.1: instruct me how to deal to each his portion and by what  path to bring you mans oblation.
text.2: i sit as priest most skilled in sacrificing the maruts and all deities impel me.
text.3: aśvins each day yours is the adhvaryus duty brahman and wood are here tis yours to offer.
text.4: who is the priest is he the priest of yama on whom is thrust this godappointed honour.
text.5: he springs to life each month each day that passes so gods have made him their oblationbearer.
text.6: the gods have made me bearer of oblations who slipped away and passed through many troubles.
text.7: wise agni shall ordain for us the worship whether fivewayed threefold or seventhreaded.
text.8: so will i win you strength and life for ever o gods that i may give you room and freedom.
text.9: to indras arms would i consign the thunder in all these battles shall he then be victor.
text.10: the deities three hundred and thirtynine have served and honoured agni.
text.11: strewn sacred grass anointed him with butter and seated him as priest the gods invoker.
